title: The Church's Need for Confessional Conversation about Same-Sex Marriage
description:
One side wants the conversation ONLY if it yields the political victory they desire, the other side tells me talk is pointless it's time to stonewall or to leave. I disagree. 

Confessional Conversation done right. https://youtu.be/HKC6YQf3ILo
Same Sex Marriage and the Patriarchs https://youtu.be/cJaJ0YAv2JM
Dr. John Suk https://youtu.be/R2MRBF5DUgs
Ross Douthat on Eric Weinstein's Portal https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/30-ross-douthat-the-rave-before-the-fall/id1469999563
Was I Too Hard on Jordan? https://youtu.be/xkuw8dDAThA
Nuance Forums https://www.meetup.com/Nuance-Forum-Nashville/
Weinstein and Schmachtenberger Grope towards Eschatology https://youtu.be/EsvG3zbKGa4
Weinstein and Schmachtenberger Search for Fullness Beyond Status and Pleasure https://youtu.be/4bzwv7mzzCc
Andrew Sullivan Circumcision https://blogs.scientificamerican.com/bering-in-mind/hey-andrew-sullivan-stop-calling-my-penis-mutilated/
Tom Holland Dominion https://amzn.to/34S4nEy
Sexual Authenticity Melinda Selmys https://amzn.to/2KjNZTA
From Shame to Sin Kyle Harper https://amzn.to/3cBEDip
Tom Holland Unbelievable https://youtu.be/7eSyz3BaVK8
Obama Same Sex Marriage https://time.com/3816952/obama-gay-lesbian-transgender-lgbt-rights/
Same Sex Marriage politics https://www.theatlantic.com/politics/archive/2015/07/gay-marriage-supreme-court-politics-activism/397052/
Dear Prudence My white girlfriend... https://slate.com/human-interest/2020/04/dear-prudence-white-girlfriend-vegan-civil-rights-movement-black-mom.html
Neil Shenvi Social Justice https://shenviapologetics.com/short-review-of-adams-teachings-for-diversity-and-social-justice
Andrew Sullivan Wikipedia https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Andrew_Sullivan
NYTimes Australian Bishop released https://www.nytimes.com/2020/04/06/world/australia/cardinal-george-pell-conviction.html
Policing Christian sexuality https://twitter.com/sacwriter/status/1247895149935333378

Click here to meetup with other channel viewers for conversation https://discord.gg/2uUhZBK The link will prompt you to download the software for this free group messaging service. This link updates every 100 users so look for the most recent videos if this link doesn't work.

If you want to schedule a one-on-one conversation check here. https://paulvanderklay.me/2019/08/06/converzations-with-pvk/

For the audio podcast mirror on Podbean http://paulvanderklay.podbean.com/

To listen to this on ITunes https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/paul-vanderklays-podcast/id1394314333 

If you need the RSS feed for your podcast player https://paulvanderklay.podbean.com/feed/ 

All Amazon links here are part of the Amazon Affiliate Program. Amazon pays me a small commission at no additional cost to you if you buy through one of the product links here. This is is one (free to you) way to support my videos.

To support this channel/podcast with Bitcoin (BTC): 37TSN79RXewX8Js7CDMDRzvgMrFftutbPo

To support this channel/podcast with Ethereum (ETH): 0xd3F649C3403a4789466c246F32430036DADf6c62

https://www.patreon.com/paulvanderklay

Also on Lbry: https://lbry.tv/@paulvanderklay

Join the Sacramento JBP Meetup https://www.meetup.com/Sacramento-Jordan-Peterson-Meetup/
